entry.title: Combined summary - Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.
entry.summary: On November 15th, 2017, Matt Corallo responded to an email from Satoshi Nakamoto regarding the importance of "keeping Bitcoin weird". The original email, sent on November 14th, 2017, discussed the need for optimism and strategic planning in cryptocurrency development, particularly in relation to Bitcoin's Lightning Network. Nakamoto also emphasized the significance of kindness in the face of criticism. While the conversation primarily focused on technical aspects, the mention of humorous hair color-related hard forks lacking consensus added a lighthearted tone. This exchange reflects the community's appreciation for individuality and creativity in their approach to Bitcoin development.
